title: Old judge australia cricketers wants list

posts.post_title: Old judge australia cricketers wants list
posts.post_content:
Hi,

I am very interested to buy or trade any of the following cards:

GOODWIN & CO., N.Y.,U.S.A.
 
‘Old Judge and Dogs Head Cigarettes’     Australian Issue ?
Celebrities, (Adopted title) 1886  ?  
Issued with Old Judge and Dog’s Head Cigarettes  
 
A.BANNERMAN


 
Celebrities, Miscellaneous and Actresses (adopted title) 1890 ? 
Plain back    Australian Issue
Old Judge Cigarette Factory at Base of card
 
GEORGE BONNER, Cricketer       
BOYLE, Manager, Cricketer
KENNEY BURN, Cricketer           
SAM’L P.JONES, Cricketer
C.T.B.TURNER, Cricketer
 
+ + 

Please note, to trade, I have the GEORGE GIFFEN card (in vg condition)

PM at [url]bruce.mcdonald1952@gmail.com[/url]

Thanks and best regards
Bruce McDonald, U.K.
